As a lot of you are saying : They've released a better[Seedborn Muse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Seedborn Muse) for U/G.  
But they've also released a "better" [Yeva, Nature's Herald](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Yeva, Nature's Herald) for U/G!  
  
You know what? That's not all. It's all in ONE SAME CARD!

5/5 easily

Posted By: Cyberium (9/18/2013 5:41:22 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Allowing this to untap all permanents would just be absurd.   
Many artifacts don't benefit from untapping on your opponents turn, but when they do benefit, it gets crazy.   
[Lux Cannon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lux Cannon) = Destroy a permanent at least twice as fast.  
[Phyrexian Processor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Processor) = How many 10/10's do you want? Oh my, that's a lot of them...  
[Time Vault](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Time Vault) = I hate your face and every detail and feature of it. Stop existing.  
  
So I'm happy this isn't 'strictly' better than [Seedborn Muse](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Seedborn Muse). Even if Kruphix could untap artifacts, it still is ![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol), which means you can't put her in any non-![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) EDH deck.
posts.html:
Allowing this to untap all permanents would just be absurd.
Many artifacts don't benefit from untapping on your opponents turn, but when they do benefit, it gets crazy.
Lux Cannon = Destroy a permanent at least twice as fast.
Phyrexian Processor = How many 10/10's do you want? Oh my, that's a lot of them...
Time Vault = I hate your face and every detail and feature of it. Stop existing.

So I'm happy this isn't 'strictly' better than Seedborn Muse. Even if Kruphix could untap artifacts, it still is , which means you can't put her in any non- EDH deck.

Posted By: Ferlord (9/21/2013 11:16:54 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
When this card was spoiled, I knew that I must have this card in all of my GU EDH decks. The potential for explosive plays are limitless.  
  
Seedborne Muse is a strong card, but one of the problems is that you have problems using the free untap without building around it a little, be it having more instants, or having flash enablers like Teferi.  
  
This card is half a Seedborne Muse, half Teferi, but the halves work perfectly together. Have some card draw and this lets you flood the board.
posts.html:
When this card was spoiled, I knew that I must have this card in all of my GU EDH decks. The potential for explosive plays are limitless.

Seedborne Muse is a strong card, but one of the problems is that you have problems using the free untap without building around it a little, be it having more instants, or having flash enablers like Teferi.

This card is half a Seedborne Muse, half Teferi, but the halves work perfectly together. Have some card draw and this lets you flood the board.

posts.post_content:
Important fun fact: Because you announce spells you cast before you choose alternate costs (like Bestow), you can actually cast bestow cards as non-creature auras with flash using Prophet. It's unintuitive, but it works!  
  
As for the card itself, I love it! It's a tad too vulnerable in Standard, but I'll be putting it into every possible EDH and Limited deck.
posts.html:
Important fun fact: Because you announce spells you cast before you choose alternate costs (like Bestow), you can actually cast bestow cards as non-creature auras with flash using Prophet. It's unintuitive, but it works!

As for the card itself, I love it! It's a tad too vulnerable in Standard, but I'll be putting it into every possible EDH and Limited deck.
